Sentencas: Today, the use of alternative energy sources such as solar energy to provide the energy demand of human societies is inevitable.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: In addition, fuel cell systems generate electricity from the energy contained in the fuel.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Meanwhile, clean energy-based hybrid energy systems can be a suitable solution for fossil fuels problems.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: However, for their widespread commercialization, more detailed and powerful studies are needed.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: On the other hand, in order to achieve sustainable development for the use of renewable energy sources due to their nature, energy storage is required.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The aim of this paper is introduce and examine a new energy system operation based on fuel cell technology and solar energy.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The novel energy conversion process proposed consisting of two subsystems, the energy generation and energy storage sub-system.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Power generation sub-system includes alkaline fuel cell (AFC), solar photovoltaic (PV) field and electrolyzer as well as Stirling engine and absorption chiller.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The second sub-system considered in this paper is energy storage using pumped-hydro-compressed air system (PHCA).
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The energy system operation is investigated and discussed under different operating conditions.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Results revealed that for a 1 kW(el) AFC, the Stirling engine and absorption chiller produce 1.27 and 2.48 kW of electricity and cooling load, respectively.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Moreover, the system efficiency is 63.8% and 73.01 kW of exergy is destroyed.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: It was also found that, up to 2.97 kWh of electricity can be stored by the PH-CA storage system.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine

Sentencas: In such a context, the required storage system volume under considered process and conditions was 11.7 m3.
Titulo: Numerical assessment of a hybrid energy generation process and energy storage system based on alkaline fuel cell, solar energy and Stirling engine
